title: Microsoft | L62 | India
content:
Education: Btech, IT
Years of Experience: 4.5
Prior Experience: SDE2 at a well known company, 60LPA(but had to leave the firm, so no job right now)
Date of the Offer: May 2024
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: SDE2, L62
Location: India
Salary: 40LPA
Signing Bonus: 3 lakhs
Relocation Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: $60k vested equally over 4 years
Bonus: 0-20% of base i.e 0 to 8 lpa
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 59LPA for first year, 56LPA from subsequent years. (Assuming an average of 50% i.e 4 lakhs bonus every year).
Benefits: Standard Microsoft benefits.
Other details: I previously had a high salary before(60LPA), and the stock component was > $100K. However, I was still offered just 60k$ worth of stocks by Microsoft. Moreover, they always give around 50% of the varialble pay if you meet expectations. I was not provided with any relocation bonus also. 
I had a long discussion with the recruiter but she was not ready to listen. I have seen L61 offers with a higher stock comonent than this. Its upsetting to see L62 offers having stocks as high as 120k-130k USD but only 60k$ USD for me, which is less than a few L61 offers as well. 
I am currently awaiting another offer right now, and am quite certain that they would come up with good numbers. In this case, should I tell the new offer to the Microsoft recruiter to renegotiate after having accepted the offer?
NOTE - I am ready to walk away from the Microsoft offer in the worst case. I already have a good brand name on my resume, so even though Microsoft would be a good to have, its not my first priority. 
Thanks.
salaryTotal: : 59lpa For First Year, 56lpa From Subsequent Years. (assuming An Average Of 50% I.e 4 Lakhs Bonus Every Year).
